Overview

SlosQueryBinder contains methods for accessing slos.

Constant Summary collapse

SLO_DETAIL_FRAGMENT = 
<<-GRAPHQL
  fragment SloDetail on Slo {
    id
    name
    percentMet
    percentTarget
    service {
      name
    }
    provider
    providerUrl
  }
GRAPHQL
SLO_SUMMARY_DETAIL_FRAGMENT = 
<<~'GRAPHQL'
  fragment SloSummaryDetail on SloSummary {
    id
    slo {
      name
      service {
        name
      }
    }
    startTime
    endTime
    percentMet24h
    percentMet28d
    percentMet13w
  }
GRAPHQL

A list of SLOs.

Parameters:

  • after (String) —

    Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.

  • before (String) —

    Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.

  • first (Integer) —

    Returns the first n elements from the list.

  • last (Integer) —

#update(**kwargs) ⇒ Response

Update an SLO's metadata.

Parameters:

  • client_mutation_id (String) —

    A unique identifier for the client performing the mutation.

  • name (String) —

    The name of the SLO.

  • percent_target (Float) —

    The objective percentage the SLO should be green.

  • playbook_url (String) —

    The URL to a document describing how to understand and remediate this SLO.

  • provider (String) —

    The provider for the SLO.

  • provider_url (String) —

    The HTML URL for the SLO.

  • service_name (String) —

    The Service this SLO belongs to.

  • context (Hash) —

    Additional headers to add to the request (optional)

Returns:

  • (Response)

#update_slo_summary(**kwargs) ⇒ Response

Execute the updateSloSummary Mutation.

Parameters:

  • client_mutation_id (String) —

    A unique identifier for the client performing the mutation.

  • end_time (Time) —

    The end time for the summary.

  • percent_met13w (Float) —

    The percent this SLO was met in a 13-week period.

  • percent_met24h (Float) —

    The percent this SLO was met in a 24-hour period.

  • percent_met28d (Float) —

    The percent this SLO was met in a 28-day period.

  • service_name (String) —

    The Service this SLO summary belongs to.

  • slo_name (String) —

    The SLO this summary belongs to.

  • start_time (Time) —

    The start time for the summary.

  • context (Hash) —

    Additional headers to add to the request (optional)

Returns:

  • (Response)
